summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented in AvatarPickerDialog.tsx via a debounced-term-driven useEffect, with empty-term clearing behavior and request-order protection using a requestId ref. No additional UI component files under frontend/src/components/ui were modified per the diff summary, though two meta/tracking files were also changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added non-functional project metadata/tracking content unrelated to the requested Giphy search fix (frontend file summaries and project_state tracking).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a functional fix in AvatarPickerDialog.tsx and explicitly scoped changes to that behavior; modifying these meta files is not requested by the requirements.
